mapper.select: SELECT pms_pk_plan.id, pms_pk_plan.name, pms_pk_plan.description, pms_pk_plan.punch_quantity, pms_pk_plan.total_bonus, pms_pk_plan.start_time, pms_pk_plan.end_time, pms_pk_pattern.description AS plan_pattern, pms_pk_plan_status.description AS plan_status FROM pms_pk_plan, pms_pk_pattern, pms_pk_plan_status WHERE pms_pk_plan.user_id = #{userId} AND pms_pk_plan.pk_pattern_id = pms_pk_pattern.id AND pms_pk_plan.plan_status_id = pms_pk_plan_status.id ORDER BY pms_pk_plan.id DESC

SELECT pms_pk_plan.name, pms_pk_plan.pk_quantity, pms_pk_plan.enrolled_quantity, pms_pk_pattern.description AS plan_pattern FROM pms_pk_plan, pms_pk_pattern WHERE pms_pk_plan.id = #{planId} AND pms_pk_plan.pk_pattern_id = pms_pk_pattern.id

SELECT pms_pk_plan.name, pms_pk_plan.pk_quantity, pms_pk_plan.enrolled_quantity, pms_pk_pattern.description AS plan_pattern FROM pms_pk_plan, pms_pk_pattern WHERE pms_pk_plan.id = #{planId} AND pms_pk_plan.pk_pattern_id = pms_pk_pattern.id
